description: DISC requires the services of a supplier for the production of tree seedlings of following species for a Spring plant in 2025
full_summary:
## Nursery Tree Seedling Growing Services 2024-2025

## Request for Proposal
[English](#english) | [Français](#français)

### General Information
* **Reference Number:** cb-860-75280526
* **Solicitation Number:** 1000253199
* **Notice Publication Date:** 2023-10-25
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-09T11:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-07-31

### Contract Description
The [Indigenous Services Canada](https://www.sac-isc.gc.ca/) is seeking a supplier to provide nursery tree seedling growing services for the Chilcotin Training Area in British Columbia, Canada. The contract will cover the production of tree seedlings of the following species:
* **Lodgepole Pine**
* **Douglas Fir**
* **Larch (plug individually wrapped)**
* **Ponderosa Pine**

The successful bidder will be required to provide the seedlings for a Spring plant in 2025, as part of the reforestation program initiated by Indigenous Services Canada. The contract will include one growing period, commencing in February-March 2024.

### Important Documents
* [Solicitation Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23022/1000253199_rfp_en.pdf) (English)
* [Solicitation Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23022/rfp---open---solicitation-1000253199---culture-en-pepiniere---amendment-1-fr.pdf) (Français)

### Important Dates
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-09T11:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-01

### Contact Information
* **Name:** Miriam Britel
* **Email:** miriam.britel@sac-isc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (373) 355-2463

### Regions of Opportunity
* **Canada** (specifically British Columbia)

### Regions of Delivery
* **British Columbia**
* **Canada**
